name: Gooey Vegan Chocolate Chip Cookies
author: Nitzan Shlapobersky
summary: These cookies are moist and delicious and also happen to be vegan!
ingredients: ⅔ cup vegan white chocolate chips
directions: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper
Cream together coconut oil, white sugar, and brown sugar in a bowl using an electric mixer
Gradually add applesauce and mix to combine
Combine flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, and salt in a bowl
Gradually add flour mixture to the bowl with the coconut oil mixture and mix until batter is smooth
Roll dough out into 2-inch balls and place onto the prepared baking sheet
Bake cookies in the preheated oven until edges are crispy, about 12 minutes
